query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS regulations (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  regulationType ENUM('law', 'decree', 'circular', 'directive', 'resolution', 'amendment', 'other') NOT NULL,
  referenceNumber VARCHAR(100),
  title VARCHAR(500) NOT NULL,
  titleAr VARCHAR(500),
  summary TEXT,
  summaryAr TEXT,
  fullText LONGTEXT,
  fullTextAr LONGTEXT,
  issuingEntityId INT,
  issuedDate DATE,
  effectiveDate DATE,
  expiryDate DATE,
  status ENUM('active', 'superseded', 'expired', 'draft', 'pending') DEFAULT 'active',
  regimeTag ENUM('aden_irg', 'sanaa_defacto', 'mixed', 'unknown') DEFAULT 'unknown',
  sector VARCHAR(100),
  keywords JSON,
  sourceDocumentId INT,
  sourceUrl VARCHAR(500),
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX regulation_type_idx (regulationType),
  INDEX regulation_issuer_idx (issuingEntityId),
  INDEX regulation_status_idx (status),
  INDEX regulation_regime_idx (regimeTag),
  INDEX regulation_issued_idx (issuedDate)
);
